mapper.select: select t1.*, t2.name user_type_name from user t1, wd_dm t2 where t1.user_type = t2.id and t2.type_id = 'user_type'
mapper.update: update user set name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, password = #{password}, sex = #{sex}, user_type = #{user_type} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT t1.*, ifnull( t2.NAME, '未知' ) food_type_name FROM food t1 LEFT JOIN wd_dm t2 ON t1.food_type = t2.id AND t2.type_id = 'food_type' order by t1.id
mapper.update: update food set name = #{name}, price = #{price}, food_type = #{food_type} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT t1.*, ifnull( t2.NAME, '未知' ) desk_type_name, case when t1.desk_type = '1' then t1.starttime else '-' end start_time, CASE WHEN t1.desk_type = '1' THEN CONCAT( TIMESTAMPDIFF( MINUTE, starttime, now() ), '分钟' ) ELSE '-' END times FROM desk t1 LEFT JOIN wd_dm t2 ON t1.desk_type = t2.id AND t2.type_id = 'desk_type' ORDER BY t1.id
mapper.update: update desk set number = #{number}, desk_type = #{desk_type}, starttime = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select t1.* from stock t1 order by t1.id
mapper.update: update stock set number = #{number}, name = #{name}, is_in = #{is_in} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from store where is_check = '1' order by update_time desc
mapper.update: update store set address = #{address}, name = #{name}, y_money = #{y_money}, phone = #{phone}, update_time = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select *, case when is_check = '-1' then '未审核' when is_check = '0' then '已审核但已拒绝' end apply_status from store where is_check in ('-1', '0') order by check_time desc
mapper.update: update store set is_check = #{is_check}, check_time = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select t1.*, t2.name order_type_name, t3.name user_name from orders t1, wd_dm t2, user t3 where t1.type = t2.id and t1.user_id = t3.id and t2.type_id = 'order_type' order by t1.create_time desc
select t1.*, t2.`name` food_name, t2.price food_price from order_detail t1, food t2 where t1.id = #{id} and t1.food_id = t2.id
mapper.update: update orders set type = #{type} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select t2.`name`, SUM(t1.food_number) `value` from order_detail t1, food t2 where t1.food_id = t2.id GROUP BY t1.food_id order by `value` desc
select count(1) `value`, t1.day `name` from (select DATE_FORMAT(t.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') `day` from orders t) t1 GROUP BY t1.day order by t1.day
